en: (Music)
fr: (Musique)
pt: (Música)
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en:
I went down
											to St. James Infirmary
fr:
Je suis descendue
											à l'infirmerie Saint James
pt:
♪ Eu desci
											♪ até à Enfermaria St. James
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: To see my baby there
fr: Pour y voir mon bébé
pt: ♪ Para ver a minha querida lá
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: She was lying on a long wooden table
fr: Elle était allongée sur une table en bois
tr: Uzun ahşap bir masanın üzerinde yatıyordu.
pt:
♪ Ela estava deitada
numa mesa comprida de madeira
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: So cold, so still, so fair
fr: Si froide, si immobile, si pâle
tr:
Öyle soğuk,öyle hoş,
öyle beyaz tenliydi ki.
pt: ♪ Tão fria, tão quieta, tão bela
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: I went up to see the doctor
fr: Je suis montée voir le docteur
pt: ♪ Fui ter com o médico
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: "She's very low," he said
fr: « Elle va très mal, » a-t-il dit
pt: ♪ "Ela está muito mal", disse ele
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: I went back to see my baby
fr: Je suis retournée voir mon bébé
pt: ♪ Voltei para ver a minha querida
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en:
Good God
											she's lying there dead
fr:
Bon Dieu
											elle était étendue là, morte
tr:
Aman Tanrım!
											Orada ölü gibi yatıyor.
pt:
♪ Meu Deus
											♪ ela estava morta
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: I went down to old Joe's bar room
fr: Je suis allée dans le bar du vieux Joe
pt: ♪ Fui até ao bar do Old Joe
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: On the corner of the square
fr: Au coin de la place
pt: ♪ Na esquina da praça
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: They were serving drinks as per usual
fr: Ils servaient des verres, comme d'habitude
tr:
İçkiler her zamanki gibi 
servis ediliyordu
pt:
♪ Estavam a servir bebidas
como de costume
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: And the usual crowd was there
fr: Et les habitués étaient là
tr: ve her zamanki gibi bütün kalabalık orada
pt: ♪ E as pessoas do costume estavam lá
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: To my left stood Old Joe McKennedy
fr:
A ma gauche se tenait
le vieux Joe McKennedy
pt:
♪ À minha esquerda estava 
o Old Joe McKennedy
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: His eyes were bloodshot red
fr: Ses yeux étaient injectés de sang
pt: ♪ Tinha os olhos raiados de vermelho
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: He turned to the crowd around him
fr:
Il s'est tourné
vers la foule qui l'entourait
pt: ♪ Virou-se para a multidão em volta
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: And these are the words he said
fr: Et voici les mots qu'il a dits :
pt: ♪ E estas foram as palavras que disse
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: "Let her go, let her go, God bless her
fr:
Laissez-la partir, laissez-la partir,
que Dieu la bénisse
tr:
Bırak gitsin, bırak gitsin,
Tanrı onu kutsasın
pt:
♪ "Deixem-na ir, deixem-na ir, 
Deus a abençoe
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: Wherever she may be
fr: Où qu'elle puisse être
pt: ♪ "Onde quer que ela esteja
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en:
She can search
this whole wide world all over
fr:
Elle peut recommencer à chercher
à travers le monde entier
pt: ♪ "Pode procurar em todo este vasto mundo
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: But she'll never find another man like me
fr:
Mais elle ne trouvera jamais
un autre homme comme moi
tr: ama asla benim gibi adamı bulamaz.
pt:
♪ "Mas nunca encontrará
outro homem como eu
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en:
She can search
this whole wide world all over
fr:
Elle peut recommencer à chercher
à travers le monde entier
pt:
♪ "Ela pode procurar
em todo este vasto mundo
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en:
And she'll never find
											another man
											like me
fr:
Et elle ne trouvera jamais
											un autre homme
											comme moi
tr:
ama asla
											benim gibi
											adamı bulamaz.
pt:
♪ "E nunca encontrará
											♪ "outro homem
											♪ "como eu.
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: When I die, please God, bury me
fr:
Quand je mourrai,
Dieu s'il vous plaît, enterrez-moi
pt:
♪ Quando eu morrer,
se Deus quiser, enterrem-me
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: In my ten-dollar Stetson hat
fr: Avec mon Stetson à 10$
tr: on dolarlık Stetson şapkamın içine gömün.
pt: ♪ Com o meu chapéu Stetson de 10 dólares
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en:
Put a twenty-dollar gold piece
on my watch chain
fr:
Mettez une pièce d'or de 20$
sur ma chaîne de montre
tr:
Saatimin zincirine yirmi
dolarlık bir altın koyun.
pt:
♪ Ponham uma moeda de ouro de 20 dólares
na corrente do meu relógio
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: So my friends know I died standing pat
fr:
Pour que mes amis sachent
que je suis mort immobile
tr:
Zaten arkadaşlarım benim
yaşayan ölü olduğumu biliyor.
pt:
♪ Para os meus amigos saberem
que morri contrariado.
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: Get six gamblers to carry my coffin
fr: Faites porter mon cercueil par six joueurs
tr: Tabutumu taşımak için altı kumarbaz seç.
pt:
♪ Arranjem seis jogadores
para carregar o meu caixão
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: And six choir girls to sing me a song
fr:
Et faites chanter pour moi
une chanson par six filles de la chorale
tr:
Ve kilisedeki koroda altı
kız bana bir ilahi söyleyecek.
pt:
♪ E seis meninas do coro
para me cantar uma canção
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: Stick a jazz band on my hearse wagon
fr:
Mettez un groupe de jazz
sur mon corbillard
tr: Caz bandını cenaze arabamın üstüne koyun.
pt:
♪ Ponham uma banda de jazz
no meu carro fúnebre
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: To raise hell as I go along
fr:
Pour semer la pagaille
alors que je m'en vais
pt: ♪ Para eu armar confusão pelo caminho
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: Now that's the end of my story
fr: C'est la fin de mon histoire
pt: ♪ Este é o fim da minha história
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: Let's have another round of booze
fr: Prenons une autre tournée
tr: Hadi bir tur daha içki içelim.
pt: ♪ Tragam mais uma rodada de álcool
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: And if anyone should ask you
fr: Et si quelqu'un vous le demande
tr: Ve eğer herhangi biri sana sorarsa,
pt: ♪ E se alguém perguntar
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en:
Just tell them I got
											the St. James Infirmary
											blues
fr:
Dites juste que j'ai
											le blues
											de l'infirmerie Saint James
tr:
onlara sadece şunu söyle:
											Aziz James Hastanesi'nin özlemini
											çekiyorum.
pt:
♪ Diga-lhe apenas que eu tenho
											♪ a melancolia
											♪ da Enfermaria St. James
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens

en: (Applause)
fr: (Applaudissements)
pt: (Aplausos)
title: "St. James Infirmary Blues"
speaker: Silk Road Ensemble + Rhiannon Giddens
